_header: O foul tongue so often here before
Subjects: complaints, lovers’; tongue, destructive power of
_description: Against a foul tongue — three stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC652.First Lines:
O fule tonge so often here byforehas þu made mony oon bryghte
                    of hewe…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…No wonder is so god me sende heleþoghe wymmen drede with
                    vs men to dele
